languages.text: "Человек, представившийся слугой династии Чорда, попросил меня о беседе. А затем — вот так редкость! — ему вышибли мозги".
"A man who introduced himself as a servant of House Chorda asked to have a word with me. And then — imagine the odds — someone blew his brains out."
languages.original_text: "Человек, представившийся слугой династии Чорда, попросил меня о беседе. А затем — вот так редкость! — ему вышибли мозги".

traits.locale_text: "A man who introduced himself as a servant of House Chorda asked to have a word with me. And then — imagine the odds — someone blew his brains out."
"A man who introduced himself as a servant of House Chorda asked to have a word with me. And then — imagine the odds — someone blew his brains out."
"A man who introduced himself as a servant of House Chorda asked to have a word with me. And then — imagine the odds — someone blew his brains out."
"A man who introduced himself as a servant of House Chorda asked to have a word with me. And then — imagine the odds — someone blew his brains out."
"A man who introduced himself as a servant of House Chorda asked to have a word with me. And then — imagine the odds — someone blew his brains out."

languages.text: 「チョーダ家の従者と名乗る男が話をしたいと言ってきた。それからは…どうなったか当ててみてくれ。誰かがその男の脳みそを吹き飛ばしたよ」
languages.original_text: "A man who introduced himself as a servant of House Chorda asked to have a word with me. And then — imagine the odds — someone blew his brains out."

traits.locale_text: 「チョーダ家の従者と名乗る男が話をしたいと言ってきた。それからは…どうなったか当ててみてくれ。誰かがその男の脳みそを吹き飛ばしたよ」

languages.text: “有个自称是库尔达家族仆人的人出现在我面前，打算和我谈谈。随后却发生了非常巧合的事情，有人一枪打爆了他的脑袋。”
languages.original_text: "A man who introduced himself as a servant of House Chorda asked to have a word with me. And then — imagine the odds — someone blew his brains out."

traits.locale_text: “有个自称是库尔达家族仆人的人出现在我面前，打算和我谈谈。随后却发生了非常巧合的事情，有人一枪打爆了他的脑袋。”

languages.text: «Un hombre que decía servir a la casa Chorda me pidió intercambiar unas palabras, pero entonces... imagínese, alguien le voló la tapa de los sesos».
languages.original_text: "A man who introduced himself as a servant of House Chorda asked to have a word with me. And then — imagine the odds — someone blew his brains out."

traits.locale_text: «Un hombre que decía servir a la casa Chorda me pidió intercambiar unas palabras, pero entonces... imagínese, alguien le voló la tapa de los sesos».

languages.text: « Un homme au service de la maison Chorda a demandé à s'entretenir avec moi, puis il s'est pris une balle en pleine tête. Vous ne trouvez pas la coïncidence troublante ? »
languages.original_text: "A man who introduced himself as a servant of House Chorda asked to have a word with me. And then — imagine the odds — someone blew his brains out."

traits.locale_text: « Un homme au service de la maison Chorda a demandé à s'entretenir avec moi, puis il s'est pris une balle en pleine tête. Vous ne trouvez pas la coïncidence troublante ? »

languages.text: "Ein Mann, der sich als Diener des Hauses Chorda vorgestellt hat, hat um ein Gespräch mit mir ersucht. Und dann – stellt Euch vor – hat ihm jemand den Schädel weggeblasen."
languages.original_text: "A man who introduced himself as a servant of House Chorda asked to have a word with me. And then — imagine the odds — someone blew his brains out."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Mann, der sich als Diener des Hauses Chorda vorgestellt hat, hat um ein Gespräch mit mir ersucht. Und dann – stellt Euch vor – hat ihm jemand den Schädel weggeblasen."

languages.text: "Kendini Chorda Hanesi'nin hizmetkârı olarak tanıtan bir adam benimle konuşmak istedi. Sonra tahmin et ne oldu. Birisi beynini uçurdu."
languages.original_text: "A man who introduced himself as a servant of House Chorda asked to have a word with me. And then — imagine the odds — someone blew his brains out."

traits.locale_text: "Kendini Chorda Hanesi'nin bir hizmetkârı olarak tanıtan bir adam benimle konuşmak istedi. Sonra tahmin et ne oldu... Birisi beynini uçurdu."
